name: Mammoth Monkey Mole
description:
A puzzle game by @ehtd and @nigonzalezm made for Ludum Dare #LD30

http://www.ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-30/?acti...

Note: If space bar is not working, click over the game to give it focus

Check the post-compo version!

Three animals from three different worlds lived peacefully, until the eclipse connected their worlds. As a mighty being, Guide them to the exit. They trust you.

Controls

SPACE BAR - Switch between Mammoth/Monkey/Mole

V - Mole pick/drop dirt, Monkey move lever

R - Restart level

ARROWS - Movement

Credits

Programming & Art: Ernesto Torres

Music and Level Design: Iván González

Testing:
